name: 8K Merge - Number Block Puzzle
description:
8K Merge Puzzle Game is a brand-new math puzzle game for puzzle lovers!

Merge tiles with numbers and reach to 8K if you can! Seems easy but no so!

How to play:
* Merge any two or more same numbered tiles which are beside, with a tap
* Way starts from 2 to as much numbers you can reach to, 2-4-8-16-32-64-128-256-512-1k- 2k- 4k- 8k - 16k .....
* When you reach to a higher tile as merged numbers in the game, the smallest numbered tiles will be automatically deleted from board, you must do that often to delete small numbers
* 2 different sized board options : 5x5 and 6x6
* Game Center lists the best players throughout the world, be the first one in championship
